org.apache.cocoon.components.language.markup.xsp
Class EsqlQuery

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.cocoon.components.language.markup.xsp.EsqlQuery
public class EsqlQuery
extends java.lang.Object

This helper class takes care of contstructing queries and cursor positioning (paging) for all different kinds of databases

Author:
Torsten Curdt based on the orginal esql.xsl
